39242651.review:
I've been playing this game quite a bit now and feel like it's a good point to give a review for this Early Access game. 

Action Squad is an arcadey take on Doorkickers and focuses strongly on fast paced action. Instead of a top down view, this game is played like an old school Sidescroller. Each mission, of which there are currently 30 in the game, puts you inside a hostage, bomb defusal or simply a "kill everyone" scenario and your job is to save the day. 

But you're not one of those boring people, who want to waste hours of their life coming up with the perfect plan... No, what you want is to be the guy who kicks in the door, throws a flashbang, clears the room and becomes the hero. And Action Squad delivers exactly that satisfying experience. 

You get to choose between 3 operators. An Assaulter, who gets to wield MPs and Carbines, a Breacher, whose choice of weapons are shotguns and a guy with a Shield and pistol.

Weapons in this game are quite simple, but feel satisfying. Shotguns usually kill in one hit and can breach doors, so you don't have to keep punching them or bring breaching charges with you. The MPs and Carbines are powerful and accurate, but get uncontrollable very quickly when firing them full auto, so you should better stick to 3-round bursts. Pistols are kind of disappointing though, as they don't really excel in anything. 

This game is quite a blast to play in Co-op. You can support each other, or split up and try to take out different areas of the map simultaneously. The different operators actually complement each other quite well, so one could play as the Shield guy and protect the Breacher when he opens the door. There is no friendly fire using guns, but grenades and breaching charges hurt your teammate, too. Once Explosive Barrels come into the game, the possibilites of jolly co-op skyrocket tremendously. 

For every kill and everytime you save a hostage, a little bar fills up. Using the shift key, you can order various items, such as medkits and ammo crates, but can also call in for a sniper support. This feature brings in a little bit of decision making and tactical planning into the game, as you can either use it to increase your health, revive a teammate, or take out multiple enemies with the sniper's help. My only complaint is, that this feature does not feel very responsive. Sometimes you need to press the fire button multiple times, before the item is selected. 

There is (currently) a downside to this game, which is its lack of content. Playing through this game once will probably take you about 3-4 hours. Only if you're really interested in getting highscores, will you actually be able to get more out of the game. Since I enjoy getting highscores and currently hold 23 of 30, I say you could at least get another 5 hours of fun, or more, out of it. 

Enemies in this game are interesting. Some just rush you with a knife, others threaten you with Uzis and Rifles, but the real gems are the enemies who use the hostages as shield or threaten to shoot them if you get too close. These enemies actually pose an interesting threat, which might force you to approach a room carefully for once. 

Ofcourse, this game is only getting started and if you know the previous Doorkickers game, you know that Killhouse does not skimp out on providing content for their game. 

I absolutely recommend this game for anyone who is looking for a fun arcade shooter with a tactical nuance to it.

39096827.review:
[h1]What is it?[/h1]
Tactical Broforce with local co-op for two.

[h1]Should I get it now or let it boil in Early Access for another year?[/h1]
Now! It's a full and well-polished core experience already. Which can easily offer several hours even on quick playthrough. I can imagine much more challenges, weapons and abilities, but it will be alright to play again or continue where one has left it.

[h1]The original Doorkickers wasn't really my thing, is it anything like it?[/h1]
The relation between two may not play well for the developer. Essentially these are two very different games. First one was a real-time strategy and this one is action, where you have to think your moves and coordinate with your co-op partner. What it takes from the original Doorkickers is the metagame: you get 1-3 stars for finishing the mission and you use these stars to upgrade your gear.

[h1]What was the test environment for this game?[/h1]
Two Steam Controllers and 7yo son, all worked exceptionally well with not much shouting upon for rushing and getting us all killed.

[h1]Score?[/h1]
9/10 when imagined full of content. One of the best games in Early Access. Shared screen co-op GOTY award.

38880310.review:
Door Kickers + Broforce = thoughtful, tactical gameplay.

The premise is, you're a member of SWAT busting into a building filled with criminals and hostages. You have to kill every criminal and rescue every hostage without mixing that up - dead hostages are a no-go! In this, it's just like the first Door Kickers. The criminals have no depth, the hostages have no story, you're just there to solve the puzzle and get the innocents out alive.

So what's different? The gameplay! Instead of a top-down strategy game, it's a platformer ala broforce. You're a single dude or dudette. You can jump, shoot, etc - you know this. What makes it stand out? The level design, the way it approaches its concept. You cannot run in guns blazing and expect to come out alive, as you're pretty fragile. You have to look at every individual room and figure out how to shut down every enemy before they kill a hostage or you. It feels more measured in its pace than Broforce - not to say that it's slow, but you'll want to take breathers between sections to feel out your plan of attack for the next section of a building - because these levels are big, and a single death means you have to do it all over again.

As of the current build - as this game is Early Access, not that it feels like it - there are three classes. You can be someone with an assault rifle, someone with a shotgun, or someone with a pistol and tactical shield. They all feel very different in play! Shotguns kill almost instantly at close range, but take a few seconds between volleys, so if you let a machete guy get too close between shots you can be dead almost instantly - whereas the assault rifle can fire for a long time, but gets more and more inaccurate the longer you use it, so you'll mow down enemies until the guy in the back gets you with accurate shots. The classes have access to different super-skills, too - as you kill criminals and rescue hostages you charge up your ability bar, which lets you summon medkits, backup, or get sniper support...or other things. This thing is key to success, especially if you're a sloppy player like me, who needs those medkits and snipers.

In sum, this is an early access game with an incredibly solid base. There's a ton of missions already in, the gameplay feels finished, and honestly the biggest mark against it so far is that you can't rebind keys. Also it's tough, like the original Door Kickers - but it's satisfying, and controls well, and I like feeling like a GI Joe as I rescue hostages. Good game!

38804033.review:
さっくり遊べて良いゲームでした。

■良い点。
・1ステージが小さいのでリトライしやすい。
　すぐ死ぬ調整だけど、すぐやり直せる。スコアアタック的にもやる気出る構成だと思う。
・アサルトライフルの撃ってる感が良い。
　撃ちっぱなしだと集弾率が下がるので手動で3点バーストするんだけど、ダダダ、ダダダっていうのが気持ちいい。
　敵の耐久力も2～3発で倒せるようになっていて無駄に硬い敵とかいないので爽快感もある。良い。
・適切に対応すれば人質に誤射する可能性がほとんど無い。
　人質は座ってるので立ちアサルトライフルの3点バーストなら敵だけ倒せる。
　人質救出のやり方を考える余地があまり無くなっているが、たぶんカジュアル向けに作ってるゲームだと思うのでこれで良いと思う。
　でもおっさん（たぶん警察官）はちょうど頭に命中する。もうちょっと屈んで？
　※人質もおっさんも1発だけなら誤射っても死なないぞ。
・困ったときのスナイパーサポート。
　ゲージさえ溜まってれば密室だろうと地下だろうと必ず仕留めるスナイパーさんまじパネェっす。強い。

■悪い点
・内部が分からない部屋に対してはほとんど無策で突っ込むしかない。スパイカムください。
・カバーできるところがいくつかあるけど、大抵はドアぶち破ってドンパチするので意味ない。
・ステージを1回開始しないと作戦目標が分からない。
　作戦目標は人質救出とか殲滅とか爆弾解体があるけど、事前に分からないのでそれに合わせた兵種選択ができない。
　1回やればメニューにも書かれるんだから最初から書いておけばいいのでは？
・一人プレイだとAssalter以外ではかなり辛い。
　やられる前にやるしかない現状だと火力不足で人質が死ぬか自分が死ぬかになってしまう。
　慣れればなんとかなるのかな…？
・兵種を変えると装備がリセットされる。いちいち装備しなおすのは面倒。

まだアーリーアクセスなのでステージも出揃ってないけど、今後も期待できそう。

我玩過Door Kickers才想試試看這款，玩過以後覺得真的還不錯，有做出這個題材應有的感覺。

以下是我覺得需要改進的地方，製作團能改進的話會有更好的遊戲體驗。

1.控制鍵的設定，手把我完全無法在遊戲選單裡改變按鍵設定，而鍵盤設定應該是改成能設定成綁定任何鍵，包括滑鼠按鍵、滑鼠中鍵按下、滾輪往上往下，一個操作型的遊戲，設定按鍵越自由才能讓越廣泛的玩家接受。（我絕不會說在不能改按鍵下，一直按錯按鍵會怒刪遊戲來退費）

2.高度差的狀況下，沒有往上下的斜角射擊非常困擾。

3.手榴彈，閃光彈還是震撼彈之類的投擲武器，在爬梯子的狀況下，能控制丟出去的方向很困擾，非常需要改善，尤其是往上爬時，敵人在頭上不能往上丟，而你停在樓梯頂端不上平面時，拿刀的敵人勢能攻擊到你的，非常的困擾。

3.再次提到我玩過Door Kickers，建議增加一些Door Kickers基本有給的裝備，例如可以從門口下方偷看的攝影機、將部分要踢3次才能開的門，改成可以用開鎖工具打開開鎖工具。

4.遊戲內採用部分房間是要開門後才能看到裡面狀況的，建議在後面的關卡可以增加依照常理事先無法偵查到的房間數量，讓敵人更平凡的在屋內巡邏開關門，配合開關門的方向性音效，會更有遊戲性。

5.Door Kickers有5個職業，期待更新有新職業，並增加能更多人一起連線，至少幾個職業就幾p吧

38698311.review:
탑뷰어 택티컬 슈터인 Door Kickers의 외전 격의 신작 게임,
Door Kickers: Action Squad입니다.

바로 이전 작품인 Door Kickers를 너무 재밌게 플레이했기에 서로 비교하면서 게임을 했습니다.
첫 미션을 플레이 하고 느낀 점은 '더도 덜도 아니고 메탈슬러그 같다' 였습니다.

전작처럼 전략을 세우고, 여러 가젯을 이용해 목적을 완수하는 그런 게임을 기대하고 구매를 했습니다.
탑뷰 형식은 아니지만 다양한 전략이 가능하고, 여러 변수와 예기치 못한 상황이 자주 나오고,

또 그것을 직접 컨트롤하며 전작에서는 부족했던 직접전투를 경험할 수 있을 것이라 생각했습니다만
전혀 그렇지 않았습니다.

시야 장악이 필요없어서 그냥 고민도 안하고 들어가면 되고,
튀어나오는 적도 진짜 허접하기 그지없습니다.

머리 위에 느낌표를 띄우며 총을 갈기는 놈과
내가 총을 쏘든 말든 저 끝에서 달려와서 내 몸에다 칼을 박으려하는 놈.

두 종류의 적 모두 그냥 총만 드르륵 쏘면 바닥에 눕습니다.
그냥 인질만 구분해서 안쏘면 됩니다.

캐릭터는 어썰터, 브리쳐, 쉴드 세가지의 병과를 선택할 수 있습니다.
전작에는 포인트와 스텔스, 2가지가 더 있었던걸 생각하면 퇴보라고 할 수 있겠네요.

2명까지 Co-op을 지원하는 것은 좋습니다만, 생각 이상으로 별 것 없습니다.
앞에 방패를 든 쉴드를 세우고, 뒤에 브리쳐나 어썰터를 세우고
그냥 빠꾸없이 들어가서 드르륵 드르륵 하다 보면 게임이 끝나 있습니다.

그렇다고 게임에 할 것이 많냐 하면 그건 또 아닙니다.
한 두시간 안에 다 클리어 할 수 있는 양의 컨텐츠.

38624290.review:
[b]あのDoorKickersが横スクロールアクションになって帰ってきた！[/b]

アーリーアクセスだが現時点でもステージは多いので普通に遊べるし、
COOPで二人プレイすることで陽動できたり意外と奥深い。
DoorKickersで出ていたガジェットが出てくるとニヤニヤできるぞ。

プレイヤーはアサルト・ブリーチャー・シールドの3兵科が使用可能。
アサルト	：近～遠距離まで幅広く対応でき、隙が最も少ない。連射しすぎるとブレが出るのでバースト撃ちを意識しよう。レーザーサイトによる狙撃でちょっとずつ進め！
ブリーチャー	：ドアを自前で速攻破壊可能かつ、近距離では一撃で倒せるがポンプアクションはツライか。弾が散らばるので人質救出作戦には向かない。スラグ弾で遠距離貫通攻撃可能。
シールド	：しゃがみ撃ちで安定性一番。ただし、敵が群れてる所では押されるため工夫が必要。特に近接特攻タイプが揃うと不利。シールド毎に異なる効果があって戦略広がる。

ガジェットは現状では2種のグレネードとブリーチングチャージのみ。
グレネードは意外と爆発が速いので突入時にも使える。フラッシュバンは人質救出でお世話になりやすい。
室内の状況が分かるならブリーチングチャージがおススメ。
ただし、どちらも室内の状況が分からないと使いづらいので先行偵察のスパイカムはよ。

また、敵を倒したり人質を救出することでポイントが溜まり、アーマー補給や体力回復が可能。
最大消費ではスナイパーによる援護、ドラゴンブレス弾、シールドにサブマシンガン装備など結構多彩。

個人的に横スクはステルスと相性がいいと思ってるので、将来的にはステルス兵科やピッキングなんかも出てほしい。
あと、ハンドガンがないのはちょっと寂しいかな。マガジンが空になったら負け確に近いし。


最後に近接の敵は移動スピード速すぎない？段差があると棒立ちになって移動してこないし。
どう見てもおクスリキメてますよ[strike]（ある意味正しいのかもしれないが）[/strike]。

38616335.review:
Action Squad is so much fun.

I'm not usually a fan of side-scrolling games, but I bought this because I really enjoyed the original Door Kickers. It's an excellent spin-off, combining the satisfying kill sprees of Hotline Miami with the tactical elements of Door Kickers.

The pacing is great, the unlockable abilities (flashbangs, body armour, breaching charges, etc) add fun gameplay divergences, and there's a solid array of level designs and enemy types to keep the game interesting. 

Its basic mechanics are straightforward, but added layers of depth encourage more play and experimentation than you might get from a more generic side-scroller.  

I've spent most of my time practising in single player, but I imagine the online and local co-op modes are a blast.

Настала зимняя распродажа и я приобрел пак, в котором была и эта игра. Изначально она мне напомнила брофорс, одна из самых удачных инди стрелялок последнего времени, но тут определенно закос под сватовские операции в ретро инди стиле. Что мы имеем в итоге: 1) Достаточна ламповая пиксельная графика 2) Кооп 3) Выбор снаряги для уровня.
Теперь перейдем к ее недостатка (ну это не минусы): 
1. Играть только на геймпаде, ибо на клаве - полное извращение ( как по мне) 
2. Пока что глупый ИИ ( не умеет прятаться и занимать выгодную позицию)
3. Простые пострелушки, основная сложность не попасть под перекрестный огонь и на шахида, ну или бочку  с бензином рядом с собой не взорвать

5. Мало оружия и снаряжения для выбора. Хотелось бы  темные уровни, где нужно использовать фонарик или ПНВ (опционально).

В итоге: несмотря на альфу мне она понравилась, я надеюсь ее будут  своевременно дополнять, улучшать, добавят вариативности в прохождении, квестовых персонажей и какую нибудь историю, возможно босов и нормальный онлайн. Да и кстати говоря если локации будут напоминать разную географию мест, то будет только в плюс.

38554924.review:
Worth every buck! 

Me and my girlfriend got into the gameplay basics very quickly. There is no tutorial (yet), but most things are straight forward and easy to grasp. 

The alpha provided enough content to keep us excited. The 3 characters each had their own playstile, which brought variation to the gameplay.

The difficulty is perfect for casual players who can somewhat work together. There are some more difficult bits where you have to retry a couple of times, yet nothing frustrating. Players who seek a greater challenge may try to get all stars on every level.

The game ran very smoothly on my GTX 1060 @ 1440p. There were no graphical issues nor problems regarding gameplay, such as glitches.

We finished the alpha, episode 1 and 2, after approximately 4 hours of playtime. 

We are both very excited for the coming episodes! I personally would like to thank the developers for putting such a wonderfully polished game on steam early access. Kudos to you!

Что это такое? Ну это как #Rainbow_Six только в 2D, или если хотите #Contra_Force с добавлением тактической части, стилизованный под #Sega тактический экшн - шутер.

На самом деле игрушка очень крутая и захватывающая, и вот почему
если вкратце:

- 2D экшн как на 16 битных приставках, с уничтожением террористов, освобождением заложников и разминированием бомб.
- Стилизованная под 16 бит графика, как на #Sega
- Элементы тактики: Пройти миссию и палить во все подряд не получится, нужно спланировать, как аккуратно сделать то или иное действие.
- 3 класса оперативников ( это пока игра в альфе, будет больше ), с собственными уникальными навыками и разблокируемой экипировкой и оружием.
- Абилки и умения направленные на регенерацию, восстановление брони, быструю перезарядку итд итп...
- 6ти кнопочное, но удобное управление. Впринципе можно и без джойстика играть.
- Игра вдвоем за одним пк. Вот это круто. Вы можете комбинировать классы и планировать свои действия работая в команде.
- Хороший саундтрек который не наскучивает.
- 2 компании по 9 миссий ( это пока еще альфа тест, будет больше )
- В последующем будут добавлена поддержка модов, редактор миссий и куча других вкусностей которые заставят вас задержаться в игре на подольше.

Ну а пока это игра в Альфе, но очень даже интересная и играбельная, всем рекомендую попробовать и поиграть, удовольствие вы гарантированно получите.

38332033.review:
El juego es extremadamente corto, en poco más de una hora se pueden completar todas las misiones con tres estrellas, y los personajes, exceptuando el "assaulter" son bastante malos (además de que son solamente 3 en total). Las armas y equipamiento de los personajes se pueden desbloquear con las estrellas que se ganan al completar las misiones, pero solamente hay tres armas por personaje, los equipamientos se comparten entre los personajes, aunque por lo que noté, no son muy útiles.
Otro factor que arruina el juego, es que aunque se puede jugar online, nunca vas a encontrar partidas. Según "Steamcharts" solamente juegan como 4 personas, esto se debe a la cortísima duración del juego. Una vez que se lo termina, nada te incentiva a seguir jugando, porque ya tendrás todos los equipamientos y armas desbloqueados.
Sin embargo, es un Early Access, así que es muy probable que todo esto cambie, obviamente van a agrear más misiones, más enemigos, probablemente más personajes, etc.

Conclusión
El juego es muy entretenido durante el tiempo que dura. Los gráficos son "amigables" y funciona perfectamente. El problema es su corta duración, cosa que seguro va a cambiar con el tiempo y actualizaciones (el juego salió hace un mes, poquísimo tiempo, le quedan muchas actualizaciones por delante).

[quote=W jednym zdaniu] [h1]Na lajka ledwie starczyło, bo gra z jednej strony świetna, z drugiej bardzo rozczarowuje  [/h1]  [/quote]
[b]Więcej - http://broda.tv/ [/b]

Po świetnym bazowym Door Kickers twórcy zrobili odprysk - również dwuwymiarowy (ale "z boku") śmieszkowy symulator antyterrorysty-bohatera, z opcją kooperacji sieciowej lub kanapowej. Jednak dałem "ledwie" lajka z dwóch powodów. Po pierwsze na plus - oprawa graficzna, świetny pixelart, mega fajny klimat. Po drugie na plus - stopień trudności, wielokrotnie dostaniemy wpierdziel. Po trzecie na plus - możliwość zaliczania plansz na różne sposoby, różnymi umiejętnościami i różnymi postaciami. Jednak po pierwsze na minus - postaci bardzo mało, ledwie 3 (mają być 4). Po drugie na minus - gra chce bazować na rozwoju przez graczy, czyli przez mapki zrobione przez społeczność. Po trzecie na minus - bardzo mały content bazowy gry starczający jedynie na kilka godzin zabawy.

Since I've seen the very first trailer I was immediately hooked up. I love Door Kickers. Even so much, that I am playing it on my phone. Action Squad however is the perfect single and coop experience. It's fast and super difficult, like Hotline Miami. Yet as tactical as Door Kickers in its core. The fog of war mechanic adds a layer of difficult and realism. I hope the devs will add fibre optics and actual door breaching techniques to further expand the tactical component of the game. 

Gameplaywise I usually play with a controller. I would suggest to alter the controls, if you plan to play with a keyboard. But you can totally tell, that the game was designed with a controller in mind.

I am absolutely hooked up and so looking forward to the content update in December as well as any other content update. Thanks KillHouse Games for another great, challenging and fun game! Can't wait for DK2 to be released, too!

37698490.review:
I see a lot of comparisons to Broforce, which does this game a disservice. The only real similarities are the art style and the sidescrolling perspective.

Door Kickers: Action Squad is an action game, for sure, and will test your reflexes, but you will not succeed if you rush into rooms blindly. As a spinoff of the original Door Kickers, which was a top-down strategy game, Action Squad translates parts of what you need to succeed into a game of an entirely different genre. You will need to make on the fly threat assessments as you clear levels room by room. The enemy with a machete charging you is more dangerous than the one with a pistol, but less so than the one wearing a bomb vest. Oh and be sure not to hit the hostage he's standing next to! Using your gear (breaching charges, flashbangs, etc) and your special abilities is imperative to success as well.

I've mainly spent the time in solo but it's a very good game already just on your own, though it is clearly designed for 2 player co-op. Two things to keep in mind. You can only shoot in the left or right directions so when you need to hit anything above or below you things get tricky. I don't know if they plan to add more directional shooting later on but it's not a huge deal. 2nd thing is, I would highly recommend having a controller to play this.

36673075.review:
Like broforce, but with an adult's attention span. This game trades out the cascading explosions and supermeatboy meat grinder for an action-puzzle, much like Mark of the Ninja or the dev's own Door Kickers. Quick thinking and smart threat assessment is as valuable as your twitchy trigger finger.  The art style is subdued but highly detailed and readable, making the most of the industrial settings with wide level design variety and garish splashes of blood where violence has occurred.
New tactical situations are presented at regular intervals, requiring flexibility and a willingness to try new equipment or higher risk maneuvers. 
This is good tactical fun on solo play, but the game really shines with couch co-op. Character classes are symbiotic, and you'll quickly develop your own preferred breach-and-clear playbook. As the challenge increases, good communication is key to getting perfect scores (and the upgrade points that come with them).  Fast reload times and high player mobility keeps 2-player deaths from being frustrating, instead keeping the 'let's try it a new way' impulse alive. It's also damned funny to experience those botched attempts together.
There's a lot to like and an impressive amount of detail and polish for an alpha.  I played at a friend's house and immediately on getting home, bought myself a copy. Whether you're in it for the 80s contra vibe or the learn-as-you-go tactical challenge, there's far more to discover and enjoy than what you'd expect. Catch some co-op on YouTube if you're on the fence, but don't stream too many levels - discovery and improvisation is part of the fun!

36600069.review:
This game is a ton of fun and I hope they keep expanding on it for quite some time.

It is strategic like Door Kickers is; you can't just barrel your way through enemies, guns blazing.  You need to think about your choices before commiting to them, and the devs require you to utilize your resources and abilities to clear levels.  It's a very different experience from Door Kickers, though.  Combat is always in real time and the game overall is much more action oriented.

The pacing and ramping of difficulty is nice; it eases you in while you get familiar with the mechanics, but gets quite tough in later maps.  Progression is similar to the original Door Kickers in that upon completing objectives, you earn stars that can be used to unlock new weapons and gear.

The map variety is good.  Most maps have many vertical levels to traverse, which really adds to the variety of choices you have for progressing through them. 

The game is also a blast to play with friends via local coop; that alone is a feature that's not too common today, and the fact that they are also looking into expanding online MP features is awesome.

This game is a steal whether you're coming for the silly 80's-style humor, the strategic depth of SWAT-based objectives, or want an intense action shooter.

36595638.review:
[h1] Door Kickers: Action Squad review [/h1]

[h1] Pros: [/h1]
-The game looks fantastic, the retro look combined with good graphics is a perfect combination.
-The sounds are okay, not too great, but it'll improve hopefully.
-Although there are only 3 charachters, each one is unique and fulfills a different role.
-The maps are great, with alot of variety and different approaches.
-You can 100% trust these devs to make a great game, I've seen them do it with Door Kickers (the original), so they are absolutely going to improve the current state of the game.
-The music is great too.
-The gameplay is good, it's really fun with two people behind one keyboard. (it plays similarly to Nidhogg in that remark)

[h1] Cons: [/h1]
-There is not alot of content. (They're going to add more content, though. [i] N. B.: This sentence can be applied to most Cons [/i])
-There are not alot of weapons. 
-Grenades and flashes are not useful IMO.
-There are only 3 charachters.
-I haven't seen randomised placement of enemies. This would give the game replayability. (Sidenote: while there is no randomisation, the game does have a star rating system, so you can replay until you get those 3 stars. Maybe you consider this replayability.)
-Not alot of levels, and seeing as I found those levels to be the same when replaying, it may be better to wait until there is more content if you want to buy this game.

[h1] Final Verdict: [/h1]
This game is an obvious masterpiece in the works, but not in its current state. There is not alot of content, not alot of replayability but it is amazing. I personally recommend this game, because I know the devs will add tons more into this game, but if you have had bad experiences with Early Acces games before, don't buy this. The devs said the first major update will come out in December, which meanse there'll be alot more content in just a few weeks, which would resolve, or try to resolve one of the major issues with this game: lack of content. If you don't trust the devs, or if you are impatient, wait a few moths and then come back. I guarantee that you will see a completely new and fresh experience. For the more trusting and patient people out there: get this game immediately, it will provide you with some quality time.

[h1] Rating: [/h1]
8.5/10 devs pls make nades gud

[h1] EDIT: 
I finished all the levels with the maximum score (3 stars) in about 6 hours, so don't expect alot of content. It is possible to finish the game entirely in about an hour, or even less, if you are a dedicated and skilled gamer.

36592595.review:
玩了一个小时左右，先来说说感受。

如果只是按照正常的横板设计游戏来说，整体的效果十分棒，但是也有一些小问题。突击手的武器，比如M4，射击精准度，前期还好，后期完全打不到人，炸了门后面对一屋子拿冲锋枪的匪徒，有心无力，没有掩体子弹打光基本就是死。同样的情况盾手会相对好处理。霰弹枪手没有玩太长时间，所以暂时先不说。

然后是支援道具，击杀到了一定个数或者时间会提升进度条，然后可以补充弹药装甲血槽，甚至加命和狙击支援，但是并没有明显的提示，玩的时候经常因为打High了，而忘了呼叫，浪费了支援槽。

之后是匪徒设定，我玩了不久，现在最让我头疼的是刀匪和冲锋枪匪。刀匪速度快，刀狠，没子弹了想即使踹开一般也会被先砍掉血，如果后面还有拿枪的补刀，基本GG;而后是冲锋枪匪，一个两个还好，但是多了打起来很困难，突击手的枪命中率还低，基本被轮死；盾手如果不是强盾，能不能活看脸；霰弹枪手虽然一枪一个，但是没有穿透力，GG。

然后是路线设计，楼梯间电梯之类的还好说，但是向上爬梯子是死亡率最高的时候，没有道具辅助，而且必须爬到顶才能开枪，如果碰到刀匪加冲锋枪匪，真的十分难打，

说完游戏设定感到的问题，再来说说游戏总体。之前说了，整体效果非常棒，但是没有太多的特色，既不复Door Kickers的策略，有不符横板设计突突突的爽快。破门炸弹，闪光弹虽然会给你战术的感觉，但是开了门还是突突突；而突突突的过程中又要不停的计算血量装甲，看各种槽，又不复类似Broforce的爽快。感觉这种非左非右的设计有点蛋疼，同时节奏的放慢更加容易造成审美疲劳，打着打着就烦了。

总体我能给个6.5分吧。

36588443.review:
One of the best 2D co-op old school games I've ever played.  I've played many games on the NES, SNES and a few other old school systems, but this is by far the most addictive and fun game I've ever played.  Heck, Mega Man Powered Up isn't nearly as addictive as this, even with its level editor.  I honestly can not wait to see what this game has coming.  We are, in theory, going to get a level editor sometime soon.  If that is true, this game will never run out of ideas.

You can play this game co-op in a non linear campaign.  There is no real story, you are just a SWAT officer who has to stop thugs and terrorists, rescue hostages and defuse bombs.  There are three classes you can play as, but I only play as the assault class, just because I'm really good as him.  Co-op can be played online and offline.  Kicking down doors is really fun, and blowing them up is even more fun.  The AI for a 2D game is actually decent.  They will shoot you on sight and if they are a suicide bomber, they will charge you as fast as they can.  Like I said above, the game is non linear so you can play any of the missions as long as they are unlocked.  You use stars to unlock gear, weapons and other stuff to play the game and save the day and it's got a really good soundtrack.  Like, it's really good.  Check it out if you want a lot of fun.  I will update more as I play more.

游戏里共有3个职业

他们都拥有不同的战术技能（灵魂翻译）：

36572708.review: As a huge fan of Door Kickers I have to say that purchasing Action Squad should not hinge on your like or dislike of that first title. Action Squad is a puzzle/twitch shooter, and while I know that sounds strange it's true. Especially if playing solo. The game is made up of trial and error approaches through the different levels till you find the path that leads to victory. You will more than likely die a few times before you find that sweet spot approach. (Video Version of Review w/ Gameplay) https://youtu.be/0_2P6c27p28 Now I'm not complaining about this as there is a very addictive nature to trying to find a way through while shooting true. I enjoyed the challenge very much, and loved unlocking new gear (although there is not to much right now.) There are 3 characters to choose from each with 3 weapons to unlock. There is also two gear slots with different options available and advisable depending on the mission (I love the multipurpose breaching charge!) One thing of note is the boost system in the game. For every postive action a meter fills granting you boosts that can be activated. These are things like sniper support, health kits, gear refills, etc. The game should offer at least 4-8 hours of play, depending on your style, with more content on the way. The graphical style and art is pleasant and well done, but didn't blow me away. The one thing that I need ASAP is the ability to reconfigure the controls as I felt I was fighting the default layout. Overall I would say that if you want a tactical 2D shooter that will make you think just as much as react, than you may have a winner here. I look forward to the continued development, refinement and expansion of this title. Great job KillHouse!

36567493.review:
[strike]Antialiasing[/strike]
[strike]64x[/strike]

还是决定认真写一写
[strike]目前市面上画质最好的像素游戏，支持多种抗锯齿技术最高可达64x[/strike]
[spoiler]画质选项里可以勾选抗锯齿，然后游戏会告诉你这并没有什么卵用，并调侃你一番[/spoiler]
 
关于游戏本身
[h1]1.关卡设计[/h1]
可以看出游戏在关卡设计上花了不少心思，使一个横版射击游戏变得有些许“战术性”而不是单纯的射爆。面对一扇加固的门，你可以选择踹开、喷子喷开、破门炸药；而房间里如果关了灯，你在进房间之前就无法知道里面的情况；地图上一些场景物品也能起到意想不到的效果，比如爆炸物(红油桶)和掩体[spoiler]绿油桶和蓝油桶[/spoiler]。

然而这种战术性却是[b]有限的[/b]。
因为关卡中敌人的位置固定而使得背版的作用大于前期准备和随机应变，以及目前版本职业和技能方面的不平衡，导致你吃瘪几次后，就会学习到固定的套路射爆一切[spoiler]包括人质[/spoiler]。

[h1]2.职业[/h1]
目前有三个职业突鸡手，喷子哥，盾爹

突鸡手：初始武器MMP5，可解锁UMP45和M4A1，特点就是射的越多越歪所以打人一定要短点[spoiler]否则容易误伤人质[/spoiler]，技能精确射击可以一枪致死。
武器：MMP5近距离要5枪打死一个人，UMP45和M4A1都是3枪
另外这游戏远距离有伤害衰减，这三把枪射程都一样

喷子哥：初始武器泵动式霰弹枪，可解锁半自动霰弹枪和S12K，技能是独头弹(S12K没有)，精度不高但是可以秒杀一条直线上的敌人[spoiler]和人质[/spoiler]。
因为喷子哥的面杀伤特性，并不推荐在有人质的关卡里使用。但是在交战距离近且无人质的关卡里可以大显神威(我说的就是2-10)。
武器：这三把武器有必要详细说说，因为非常坑爹。
首先这三把喷子虽然看起来完全不一样，但是拿在小人手里模型都是一根铁棍，而且射击时都会有泵动式霰弹枪那个上膛[spoiler]撸管[/spoiler]的动作，导致这三把喷子的射速几乎没有差别。而每把喷子的收束效果又不一样(差距不算特别大)，其中泵动式最好，S12K最差，这就导致了泵动式近距离致死效果最好，而既没有技能，射速不快，散射又大的S12K就几乎是个废物了，Saiga12K独有的弹匣供弹却使其无法在装填状态中开火——这更像是另一个缺点了。这三把枪最大射程并不一致，收束效果最好的泵动式反而射程最近。

盾爹：为什么叫盾爹，原因有三：
一是本作类似前作door kickers的护甲设定，[b]护甲并不是提供减伤，而是给予你完全免疫伤害的机会。[/b]比方说敌人打了你一枪，你的护甲把这次伤害免疫了，那么你不会掉一点血，相对的会减少护甲值；如果没能免疫，那么则相反，扣血不掉护甲。
盾爹因为拥有巨量的护甲，可以承受敌人大量的攻击。[strike]需要注意菜刀哥的攻击是穿甲的。[/strike]
[strike]持盾重甲的盾爹移动速度和另外俩货一模一样，不科学。[/strike]
二是因为盾牌，盾爹三种盾牌，第一种没啥卵用可以把人打晕[spoiler]敲四下可以把人敲死，和踢人伤害是一样的[/spoiler]，第二种就厉害了，闪光盾[strike]爽光盾[/strike]，可以闪瞎前方敌人的狗眼，简直就是无消耗的瞬发闪光弹，第三种没技能更耐揍点。
三是因为武器，别看盾爹是拿的是手枪，这手枪可厉害了，三把手枪射程和突鸡手的冲锋枪、突击步枪一样，伤害却更高，glock近距离打人4枪，M&P.40要3枪，M1911只要2枪。手枪还有一个隐藏属性，就是你按键速度越快，射速就越快(会比你按住开火键更快)[spoiler]撸仙啊[/spoiler]。
这么一看是不是觉得盾爹屌炸了，集生存伤害控制于一身，唯一的不足就是手枪弹匣太小，M1911面对三个以上的敌人时容易吃瘪[strike]但是你有控制啊[/strike]。

[h1]3.支援技能[/h1]
[strike]我只说一个套路，狙击手可以消灭[b]黑暗房间里的敌人[/b]。[/strike]
[strike]这才是关灯房间的正确打开方式，而不是破门炸药，因为不背版的情况下你不知道门后是人质还是敌人。[/strike]
[b]注：此方法在11月24日的更新后已失效，狙击手无法消灭战争迷雾内的敌人了。[/b]

总结：此游戏有些初见杀，初上手以及遇见新敌人/新套路时往往会懵逼，[strike] ？？？这拿菜刀的怎么跑的跟疯狗一样，？？？怎么还有安拉胡阿克巴的，？？？梯子上的人我应该怎么打 [/strike]而当熟悉之后这一切就变得欢乐起来，至少联机互坑还是很欢乐的。
目前看来是有一点儿战术性的射爆游戏。

39507939.review: 万万没想到只有36MB大小的游戏能玩这么爽，良心良心

39528030.review:
2D橫版GAME中戰術動作游戲的王道作品，有很多有意思的創意和點，完成度還不夠高，但是足夠暢玩，鍵位自定義程度也還不夠高，樓梯的體驗絕對是詬病，不過總體來説還是良作，有基友一起游玩的話體驗會更好，孤狼模式配合符合節拍的炸彈倒數也是十分帶感的。


剛開始沒有gear的時候喜歡用shielder，手撕暗門風險大也可以用盾化解，估摸時間延遲拆門可以shock暗門對面來查看動靜的萌新，升級閃光盾之後 RUSH B就好
後來限時拆彈，需要高速突破和强力殺敵，Breacher自然而然上位，semi-auto都是假的，帶初始的pump-action就好，配合BGM和倒數直接散彈拆門，龍息秒人，M870(霧) RUSH B！
Assulter估摸著是仨人裏出場率最低的，連射精度懲罰特別大，Alt fire也就是一發精度射擊，講道理我Breacher的slug也能這麽耍，MP5傷害低，M4A1散射大，真的不如前二位
